name: Fishfists
description:
Fishfists
We created this game for the MiniJam 33 with the theme "Underwater", where you had to use bubbles as a mechanic.

Fishfists is a 2 player fighting game where each player plays a fish.

Player1 Controls:
WASD - Move the fish
J - Punch
K - Special attack

Player2 Controls:
Arrow Keys - Move the fish
Numpad 7 - Punch
Numpad 8 - Special attack

The upper bar shows your energy. 
The lower bar shows the current state of your special attack.

The special attack is a bubble shot. If the other player is hit, he is directly sent into the fish mode for a few seconds, where he can't do anything except being a fish.
During this mode, he takes extra damage and can't attack. After a few seconds, the fish regrows its arms.
